author: cvuosalo
body:
Prepare for migration of CMMSW files from CLHEP units to user-defined literal units. Move `DetectorDescription/Core/interface/DDUnits.h` to `DataFormats/Math/interface/GeantUnits.h` so it can be used throughout CMSSW. Delete redundant `DetectorDescription/DDCMS/interface/DDUnits.h`. Change the `CONVERT_TO` and `ConvertTo` macros to specific functions with names that note what units are converted to what.

This PR should have no run-time effects.
title: Move DDUnits.h out of DetectorDescription for general use
